attributes.action: British Home Secretary is asked to Deport Bangladeshi suspected war criminals from the United Kingdom to face the trial at ICTB
attributes.additional_details:
British Home Secretary is asked to Deport Bangladeshi suspected war criminals from the United Kingdom to face the trial at International Crimes Tribunal Bangladesh (ICTB).
We, the Bangladeshi nationals around the World ask the British Home Secretary Rt. Hon. Theresa May MP to cancel the citizenships of the Bangladeshi suspected war criminals and detain and set a removal directions to remove them from the United Kingdom to Bangladesh, because their presence in the UK is not conducive to public good, for their alleged promotion of terrorism, involvement in killings and for their active participation in “propagating, instigating, planning and supervising crimes that resulted in killings of millions of unarmed Bangladeshi civilians in 1971.”
UK shouldn't be a safe haven for Bangladeshi suspected war criminals. British Government should send Bangladeshi suspected war criminals immediately to face the trial in Dhaka at ICTB.
